item.title: Mutua Madrileña supports the UMH motor rehabilitation project with 60,000 euros using a brain-robot interface

item.title: Stroke neurorehabilitation
item.description: In Spain, 420,000 people live with acquired brain injury (ABI), who require neurorehabilitation therapies and rarely access robotic therapies.
